middleIsland.name: Middle Island
middleIsland.location: Repulse Bay, Hong Kong Island South

racingAreas.primary: Southern waters of Hong Kong Island

advantages.access: Gateway to eastern waters and outlying islands
advantages.cruising: Base for Sai Kung and eastern territories

localHazards.name: Lamma Island
localHazards.description: Creates significant wind shadows and current effects

localHazards.name: Stonecutters Island
localHazards.description: Heavy commercial traffic and container ships

localHazards.name: High-speed ferries
localHazards.precautions: Maintain constant watch, give way early

airport.customs: Temporary import available for racing equipment

local.parking: Limited at harbor venues, ample at Sai Kung

provisioning.dining: World-class restaurants, dim sum, international cuisine

localCustoms.prizeGiving: Formal ceremonies expected, speeches in English and Cantonese
localCustoms.networking: Business relationships important, exchange of business cards
localCustoms.hospitality: Reciprocal club arrangements common across Asia-Pacific
localCustoms.dining: Post-race dining traditional, dim sum popular

businessCulture.punctuality: Critical for all events, 'Hong Kong time' is punctual
businessCulture.hierarchy: Respect for senior sailors and commodores
businessCulture.formality: Business casual to formal depending on event

practicalTips.currency: Hong Kong Dollar (HKD), widely accepted cards
practicalTips.language: English widely spoken in sailing community
practicalTips.tipping: 10% in restaurants, round up for taxis
